short_summary: Housekeeping services for administrative facilities of the Quebec Field Unit (QFU) of Parks Canada
description: The service includes housekeeping of the administrative facilities in two buildings located on the north shore sites of the Parks Canada Quebec Field Unit, covering the period from August 1, 2024 to July 31, 2027, with an option to extend for up to two additional years. The contract includes 2 optional site visits. Security requirement associated with this bid solicitation, New personnel security clearance requests will require mandatory fingerprints to initiate the criminal record check. The validity of an existing personnel security clearance issued by the Government of Canada is not affected by the change in the criminal record check process. Applicants who require a personnel security clearance are responsible for all costs associated with fingerprinting. All enquiries of a technical and contractual nature are to be submitted to the Contracting Authority.
full_summary:
# Solicitation Title
Housekeeping Services for Administrative Facilities at the Quebec Field Unit

## Identification and Procurement

* **Reference Number:** `cb-899-50629545`
* **Solicitation Number:** `5P300-23-0341/A`
* **Publication Date:** `2024-05-23`
* **Tender Closing Date:** `2024-06-20T14:00:00`
* **Contracting Entity:** `Parks Canada`

## Disclaimer
Parks Canada will only accept BIDS received by Fax and Email as OFFICIAL submissions. Bids received in-person or by Courier will NOT be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is `soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca`. Bids submitted directly to the Contracting Authority or to any email address other than `soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca` will not be accepted.

## Description of Government Requirements
Parks Canada requires housekeeping services for administrative facilities at the Quebec Field Unit. The contract period is from August 1, 2024, to July 31, 2027, with the possibility of two (2) additional optional years.

## Security Requirement
Security clearance is a requirement for this project. New personnel security clearance requests will require mandatory fingerprints. Applicants who require a personnel security clearance are responsible for all costs associated with fingerprinting.

## Optional Site Visit
The Bidder or a representative is encouraged to visit the site. A site visit will be conducted at 2 D'Auteuil Street, Quebec, on May 31, 2024, starting at 2:00 PM.

## Response Period for Bidders
All enquiries regarding this solicitation must be submitted in writing and received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time to respond. Bidders are advised to clearly label emails with the solicitation number, project name, and indicate how many emails are included.

## Documents
Documents related to the solicitation can be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

## Disclaimer - Administrative Matter
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers. The proposed contract can have documents in one of Canada's official languages, however in case of discrepancies between the English and French documents, please contact the Contracting
